metadata.author: Panaderia Libre
metadata.description: A flavorful seasoning mix for stuffing made with dried herbs, spices, and bouillon powder. Perfect for sourdough-based stuffing recipes.

ingredients.name: Sugar
ingredients.notes: Adds a subtle sweetness to balance flavors.

ingredients.name: Nutritional Yeast
ingredients.notes: Adds a savory, umami depth to the mix.

ingredients.name: Dried Chopped Celery
ingredients.notes: Gives a classic celery flavor to stuffing.

ingredients.name: Dried Parsley Flakes
ingredients.notes: Adds herbal freshness to the mix.

mixing: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk or stir thoroughly to ensure even distribution of flavors.
Store the mix in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.
usage: Use 15 grams of this mix per 6 oz (170g) of dried sourdough bread cubes for stuffing.
Mix with butter or broth as needed to enhance flavor.

recommendations: Store in an airtight container at room temperature.
Keep away from direct sunlight and moisture.
Best used within 6 months for optimal flavor.

contains: Chicken Bouillon Powder (may contain dairy or soy derivatives)
